docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: wiki ​构建
docs.text: wiki​构建​分为​两个​部分​，​一部分​是​markdown​文本​存储​和​显示​，​一部分​是​自动​生成​的​网页​文本​存储​和​显示​。

docs.title: 1 ​环境​安装
docs.text:
pip3 install mkdocs #​安装​wiki​搭建​工具​ 
mkdocs --version   #​查看​版本​，​检查​安装​是否​成功​

# ​新建​维基​
mkdocs new inner-wiki
cd inner-wiki

# ​启动​wiki​服务​
mkdocs serve 

# ​更换​主题​为​git​风格​
pip3 install mkdocs-material 
​修改​mkdocs.yml,​增加​风格​设置​

docs.title: 2.1 ​托管​md​文件
docs.text:
cd inner-wiki
git init
git add remote https://github.com/user_name/repository_name
git add .
git commit -m "first commit"
git push origin master

docs.title: 2.2 ​托管​html​文件
docs.text:
​部署​wiki​站点​，​以下​命令​执行​两个​操作​：

  1. ​将​md​文件​自动​转为​html
  2. ​将​html​自动​托管​到​远程​仓库​的​gh-pages​分支​
mkdocs gh-deploy  # ​自动​托管​
https://user_name.github.io/repository_name #​访问​对应​的​网页​

docs.title: 编辑​后​无脑​更新
docs.text: mkdocs gh-deploy && git add . && git commit -m "update" && git push origin master
